Package net.sourceforge.waters.model.compiler.context

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BindingContext
    Context information to show how an item was instantiated during compilation.
    CompiledRange  
    VariableContext
    More detailed compiler context information that includes range information for EFA variables.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AliasBindingContext
    A binding context constructed when compiling an alias.
    CompilationInfo
    A utility class that helps to collect source information records and compilation errors while compiling a module.
    CompiledEnumRange  
    CompiledIntRange  
    ModuleBindingContext
    A binding context constructed when compiling a module.
    OccursChecker
    A simple implementation of the occurs-check.
    RangeEstimator
    An evaluation component to estimate the range of simple expressions.
    SimpleExpressionCompiler  
    SingleBindingContext
    A binding context that binds a single variable to an expression.
    SingleBindingVariableContext
    A variable binding context that binds a single variable to an expression.
    SourceInfo
    A link between the input and the output of the ModuleCompiler.
    SourceInfoCloner
    An implementation of a ModuleProxyCloner that tracks source information while cloning.
    SumSimplifier
    A simplifier sub-task to normalise sums.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DuplicateIdentifierException  
    UndefinedIdentifierException  
    UnsupportedOperatorException
